column4: I'm getting an MD5 mismatch on http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/hoary/main/binary-i386/Packages.gz
is there a mirror that carries hoary?
well, it seems to me, that a mirror of a file that gives you md5 mismatch wont help, since its a mirror of that file? :)
Well, switching to mirrorservice.org fixed it :)
